information.name: Frank Gustav
information.detail: UXGurus's team is very approachable and professional. They are able to understand the needs of our organization and what we are looking for in terms of candidates specifically. They are very attentive throughout.

information.name: Suresh Jaisawal
information.detail: UxGurus have been very responsive to our requests, bringing the right skillset, on-time & every time.  They have carved a niche in a chosen area. This is compelling us to continue our engagement in the days to come. It has been a win-win situation for all stakeholders.
